Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 13

Contact us:

Manager: Helen Hudson and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
13A Peasenhall Swan Gallop 0935 – 0955
13B Peasenhall Mill Hill 1000 – 1015
13C Heveningham Forge House 1030 – 1050
13D Laxfield Church 1100 – 1200
13E Laxfield Hartismere House 1205 – 1230
13F Laxfield Cake Street 1240 – 1255
13G Cratfield Silverleys Green 1415 – 1435
13H Cratfield Poacher Inn PH 1445 – 1500
13I Huntingfield Huntingfield Arms PH 1515 – 1530
13J Walpole Peasenhall Road 1535 – 1555

Calling every 4 weeks on Tuesdays:

2016: 5 January, 2 February, 1 March, 29 March, 26 April, 24 May, 21 June, 19 July, 16 August, 13 September, 11 October, 8 November, 6 December
